export const Bio = {

    "Web Developer",
    "UI/UX Designer",

  description:

    date: "Jun 2024 - Present",
    desc: "I've played a pivotal role in the end-to-end project lifecycle, from initial stakeholder engagement to solution delivery, while ensuring adherence to professional standards. As the primary developer of a Claim Management System, I utilized React.js and Tailwind CSS to streamline claim submissions for company employees. Additionally, I served as Scrum Master and Product Owner, guiding Agile ceremonies and managing the product backlog to ensure timely feature delivery and alignment with business goals.",

export const education = [

    school: "University Tunku Abdul Rahman (UTAR)",
    date: "Jan 2020 - Jan 2023",
    grade: "2.9384 CGPA",
    desc: "I demonstrated proficiency in programming languages by developing and implementing various mobile apps, websites, and systems for class projects. Additionally, I completed coursework in key subjects like data structures, algorithms, and software design principles, achieving a GPA of 2.9384 in relevant courses. During a semester-long internship at a tech company, I collaborated with senior engineers on software development projects. For my Final Year Project, I designed and developed a user-friendly mobile app for crypto auto trading, incorporating grid functionality to automate trades effectively.",
    degree: "Bachelor of Science (HONS) Software Engineering",
  },

];

export const projects = [

It provides a user-friendly interface for employers to keep track of their employees' daily work activities and empowers employees to log their tasks efficiently. \nAdmin Credentials: # Email: testadmin@gmail.com #Password- 123@testadmin, Employee Credentials:	#Email: testemployee@gmail.com	#Password- 123@Testemployee",

Green arrows signify opportune moments for buying, offering entry points, while red arrows highlight favorable sell signals, suggesting potential exits. These signals reflect my expertise and can assist traders in making informed decisions and managing positions effectively. As always, comprehensive analysis and prudent risk management are essential in navigating the inherent risks associated with trading.",
